meta.title: Codisans | Custom Shopify Storefronts
meta.description: We build headless Shopify storefronts with Hydrogen — fast, scalable, and designed to convert.

header.title: Custom Shopify Storefronts That Load Fast and Sell More
header.summary: Get a headless Shopify storefront built with Hydrogen: lightning-fast UX, room to grow, and a setup engineered to turn more visitors into customers — without giving up Shopify reliability.

benefits.title: Why a Custom Storefront Beats a Theme
benefits.description: Themes are great to launch. When you need speed, flexibility, and growth without piling on apps and workarounds, a custom storefront gives you the edge.

performance.heading: Lightning-Fast Performance That Converts
performance.description: Give shoppers an instant, smooth experience that boosts SEO, improves mobile performance, and lifts conversion.

brand.heading: Unique Brand Experiences, Zero Compromises
brand.description: Stop fighting template limits. Build the product flows, interactions, and journeys your brand actually needs.

scale.heading: Built to Scale Without Rebuilding
scale.description: Add features, markets, and integrations as you grow — without a costly rebuild.

tco.heading: Lower TCO, Higher Control
tco.description: Reduce app bloat and monthly costs. Replace subscriptions with tailored functionality you fully control.

commerce.heading: Advanced Commerce Logic, Simplified
commerce.description: Support B2B flows, subscriptions, custom pricing, and deeper checkout logic — without hacking a theme.

why-shopify.title: Shopify Reliability, Custom-Built for Your Brand
why-shopify.summary: You get Shopify’s enterprise-grade platform — plus the freedom of custom development where it matters most.

checkout.heading: Best-in-Class Checkout That Converts
checkout.description: Lean on Shopify Checkout and Shop Pay — trusted by 150M+ high-intent users and built to convert.

infrastructure.heading: Rock-Solid Infrastructure That Scales
infrastructure.description: Handle launches, spikes, and viral moments with confidence. Shopify’s infrastructure is built for scale.

apis.heading: Powerful APIs & Developer Ecosystem
apis.description: Use robust APIs and a huge app ecosystem when it helps — and go custom when you need something exact.

innovation.heading: Continuous Innovation & AI-Powered Tools
innovation.description: Keep getting new platform improvements and commerce tooling — without rebuilding your store every year.

global.heading: Built for Global Commerce
global.description: Sell internationally with built-in support for localization, multi-currency, shipping, and compliance.

case-studies.title: From Good Stores to Great Sales Engines
case-studies.summary: See how we’ve helped brands like yours build faster storefronts, better UX, and stronger conversion.

contact.heading: Ready to Build a Storefront That Performs?
contact.description: If you’re outgrowing your theme, launching, or rebuilding for speed, we’ll help you ship a custom Shopify storefront that delivers measurable results.

header.title: Intelligent Automation & AI Solutions
header.summary: We help you find the right automation opportunities for your business — the ones that actually make a difference. No hype, no complexity. Just smart solutions that free your team to do what they do best.

automate.heading: Less busywork, more impact
automate.description: Stop drowning in busywork. We identify repetitive tasks that drain your team's energy and replace them with intelligent automation.

customer.heading: Better experiences for your customers
customer.description: Give your customers the experience they deserve. We help you deliver faster, more personalized interactions that build lasting relationships.

operations.heading: Operations that run smoothly
operations.description: Your business should run like a well-oiled machine. We find the friction points and smooth them out with smart, thoughtful automation.

case-studies.title: We've helped teams like yours work smarter

meta.title: Codisans | Custom CMS Websites
meta.description: We build bespoke CMS websites with Statamic - a flexible content management system built on Laravel. Perfect for content-heavy sites that need the power of a custom build.

header.title: Websites that grow with you, powered by your story.
header.summary: Your CMS should work for you, not the other way around. That's why we build with Statamic — a flexible platform that gives your team complete control over content while we handle the technical complexity. You focus on telling your brand's story; we make sure the technology never gets in your way.

statamic.heading: A CMS that gets out of your way

reasons.title: Why choose Statamic?
reasons.summary: Your team deserves tools that make their work easier, not harder. Statamic combines an intuitive experience your team will love with the robust capabilities your business needs to scale.

editor-friendly.heading: Editor Friendly UX
editor-friendly.description: Your content team shouldn't need a developer to make updates. We craft interfaces that match how you actually work, so your team can move faster and stay in their creative flow.

flexible.heading: Flexible & Scalable
flexible.description: We build for where you are today and where you'll be tomorrow. As your content needs evolve, your site adapts seamlessly — no costly rebuilds or compromises.

powerful.heading: Powerful APIs & Ecosystem
powerful.description: Your website is part of a larger ecosystem. We ensure everything talks to each other smoothly — your CRM, analytics, marketing tools, and whatever comes next.

case-studies.title: We've helped brands like yours tell their stories online

meta.title: Codisans | Laravel
meta.description: Desarrollamos plataformas de alto rendimiento que aprovechan bien tus recursos, tecnología y presupuesto. Hechas para escalar a medida que creces — sin desperdicios ni partir de cero.

LaravelPage.title: Custom Laravel Solutions
LaravelPage.intro: We build Laravel applications that power real businesses: internal tools, customer platforms, APIs, and more. Fast delivery, clean architecture, built to scale with you.

what.title: What is Laravel?
what.description: Laravel is a powerful open-source PHP framework for building full-stack web applications. It comes with robust built-in tools while giving developers complete freedom to customize and extend. Whether you need a headless API or a fully integrated platform, Laravel handles complexity without getting in your way.

reasons.title: Why Laravel?
reasons.summary: Laravel is updated weekly with new features and bug fixes. Furthermore, Laravel is flexible, allowing code to be reused across projects. This allows new projects to be completed faster. Combined with its high code quality, this makes Laravel a preferred platform for major players like Spotify, KIA, and Sprout Social.

future-proof.title: Future Proof
future-proof.description: Laravel scales from simple web apps to complex enterprise systems. High performance, easy configuration, and fast setup out of the box.

open-source.title: Open Source
open-source.description: Backed by a massive community with weekly updates and thousands of packages. No vendor lock-in, ever.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: Built-in tools and community packages mean less time reinventing the wheel and faster time to launch.

safety.title: Safe
safety.description: Regular security updates and built-in audit tools keep vulnerabilities in check.

statamic.title: Statamic CMS
statamic.description: Statamic is a flexible content management system built on Laravel. It makes creating and managing custom websites simple, while giving developers full control under the hood. Perfect for content-heavy sites that still need the power of a custom build.

case-studies.title: Our Laravel Case Studies
case-studies.description: Explore real-world examples of Laravel in action. Discover how Laravel has been used to build scalable and secure applications for various industries.

specialists.title: Laravel Specialists
specialists.description: We've spent years building custom websites, platforms, and APIs with Laravel. We know the framework inside and out, from rapid prototyping to production-ready systems. If you're looking for a team that can deliver solid, scalable Laravel applications, we're ready to build with you.

ai-automation.title: Automation & AI

cms-websites.title: Bespoke CMS Websites
cms-websites.description: Take control of your narrative. We build custom Content Management Systems around your specific workflow, giving your marketing team the speed and flexibility off-the-shelf solutions can't match.

page-intro.title: Experts in web solutions
page-intro.description: We specialize in developing taylor-made software solutions. By aligning our technology with your business goals, we create digital products that create tangible value.

sticky-list-block.heading: We continuously refine our processes to garantee results
sticky-list-block.description: Every project follows a clear, structured process designed to reduce risk, increase clarity, and deliver results. From discovery to deployment, we stay aligned and transparent every step of the way.

item-1.heading: 1. Discover
item-1.description: We start by getting to know your business inside and out. Through workshops, research, and direct collaboration, we uncover what your users need and where your biggest opportunities lie.

item-2.heading: 2. Define
item-2.description: Together, we turn insights into a clear plan. We map out key features, user flows, and technical requirements so everyone’s aligned before a single line of code is written.

item-3.heading: 3. Build
item-3.description: With a solid foundation in place, we move into development. We build iteratively, stay in constant communication, and adapt as needed—always keeping performance, scalability, and user experience front and center.

item-4.heading: 4. Deliver
item-4.description: We launch with confidence. Every product goes through rigorous testing, polish, and QA. Once live, we support your team to ensure a smooth rollout and a strong start.

three-column-text.heading: We have a code.
three-column-text.description: Across every phase of our work, you can depend on three core promises that ensure we deliver exceptional results, together.

item-1.heading: Transparent
item-1.description: We believe great partnerships are built on trust and clarity. From day one, we communicate openly about scope, timelines, trade-offs, no hidden costs or surprises, while avoiding technical jargons.

item-2.heading: Meticulous
item-2.description: We are meticulous in our approach to every project. We take the time to understand the client's needs and goals, and we work tirelessly to deliver a product that is not only functional, but also beautiful and easy to use.

item-3.heading: Collaborative
item-3.description: We are collaborative in our approach to every project. We work closely with the client to understand their needs and goals, and we work tirelessly to deliver a product that is not only functional, but also beautiful and easy to use.

global.case-studies-summary: We build a variety of web solutions, from simple landing pages to complex web applications.

global.services-summary: As long as those opportunities involve giving us money to re-purpose old projects — we can come up with an endless number of those.
